rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Central entry with ample natural lighting and Vastu-aligned direction for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed to maximize sunlight and cross ventilation. Features large windows along the eastern facade in adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for communal dining, with windows ensuring natural light.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated entertainment space with soundproofing and ambient lighting that also allows natural light filtering through strategic openings.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-ventilated bathroom for guests with direct access from the living area.

rooms.name: Utility Room / Storage
rooms.description: Functional space for storage and minor utilities, ensuring easy maintenance and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Garage Area
rooms.description: Dual-car garage integrated into the ground floor with direct access to the main living area and designed for optimal light and airflow.
